content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) used for converting iron ore (with coal) into iron plates

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) used for converting copper ore (with coal) into copper plates

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Incorrect get_entities usage  
  – Ensure that API calls to get_entities use the correct parameters. Avoid unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and supplying positional arguments if the function accepts none.

• Lab placement and crafting issues  
  – Confirm that the required Lab item is available in the inventory before attempting placement.  
  – Verify that all sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables) are sufficiently available to craft a Lab.  
  – When retrieving entities for Lab operations, handle cases where a None value is returned rather than iterating over it.

• Resource prerequisite verification  
  – Prior to initiating Lab production, ensure that smelting and crafting operations have successfully produced enough primary resources to support the required sub-ingredient chain.
